sections.title: Error Use Case
paragraphs: The `totalPaymentDue` property of the submitted `Order` or `OrderProposal` does not match the value calculated for that `Order` or `OrderProposal` by the Booking System.

description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
name.example: The 'totalPaymentDue' property of the submitted 'Order' or 'OrderProposal' does not match the value calculated for that 'Order' or 'OrderProposal' by the Booking System.
name.defaultContent: The 'totalPaymentDue' property of the submitted 'Order' or 'OrderProposal' does not match the value calculated for that 'Order' or 'OrderProposal' by the Booking System.

description: An integer representing the HTTP status code.
